meanings.sent1: The ladybug had a dotted back.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dotted dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The dotted notebook looked like a sky full of stars.
meanings.sent4: The dotted path led us through the forest like a trail of breadcrumbs.
meanings.sent5: The dotted pattern on the fabric was as eye-catching as a rainbow.
